Rating: R (Some Drug Use|Language Throughout|Crude and Sexual Content)
Synopsis: When best friends -- though polar opposites -- Jonesie and Sid both break up with their girlfriends at the same time, they decide to move in together in a misguided attempt to help each other through their respective breakups. Alongside their friends Angry Mike and Runway Dave, things move quickly from heartbreak to hilarity, to life, and potentially, death.
Title: Bromates
